510450.name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 13
510450.description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Ankheg
  • Anxious Player
  • Axe Fighter
  • Bat in Flight
  • Beltram
  • Centipede
  • Dual Wield Ranger
  • Elven Archer
  • Fighter with Scimitar
  • Ghost Spider
  • Hardened Fighter 1
  • Kenku with khopesh
  • Kenku with staff
  • Kru-Knid Ambusher
  • Kru-Knid Attacker
  • Manticoid Archer
  • Manticoid Martial Artist
  • Manticoid Mystic
  • Manticoid Spearman
  • Manticoid Warrior
  • Master Drayven Stahl
  • Maverick Player
  • Necromancer
  • Southern Fighter
  • Tierfling Player
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
